name: Succubus Senki
description: A tactical top down RPG game focused around fighting various types of succubus! Resist the monster girls' lewd attacks, and if you give in you'll get raped! This is a highly focused femdom/seduction based game, and includes absolutely no reversal (no ahegao or humiliation). Our circle prides itself on seduction based work, packing this game with an endless amount of seductive content!​
